title: Woman's blouse
description: two panels sewn together to create pullover poncho with open sides; red; woven in multicolors (primarily purple) with birds, owls, quadrupeds, deer and human figures; small line of yellow stitching in one area near hem; two small green stitches on opposite panel on same side
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
